title: AI Literacy Course
description: See notes from my Winter 2025 course, AI/IA - Artificial Intelligence in the Information Age.
Explore technical foundations, co-creativity, ethics, and practical applications of AI.

title: Study At Denver
description: Interested in Library and Information Science in Denver? See information about our onsite program (especially the Research Data Management concentration) and our online program. Feel free to reach out!
